sentences.en: A dank, earthy smell filled his nostrils.
sentences.cn: 潮湿, 土腥味填充了他的鼻孔.

sentences.en: Cold, dank, and foul - smelling, it was dangerous by any name.
sentences.cn: 寒冷, 潮湿和肮脏的气味, 它是危险的.

sentences.en: Dank Buy second hand furniture, save the trees.
sentences.cn: 购买二手家具, 拯救树木.

sentences.en: Drifting along the dank canals of Venice.
sentences.cn: 沿着威尼斯阴湿的运河漂移.

sentences.en: He passed his hand across his forehead. It was dank with clammy sweat.
sentences.cn: 他用手抹抹前额, 额上满是湿漉漉粘糊糊的汗珠.

sentences.en: His white hair was in sharp contrast to his dank skin.
sentences.cn: 他的白发同他的黑皮肤形成鲜明的对比.

sentences.en: It was dank and clanked; It'smelled like history.
sentences.cn: 那间房子阴湿,当啷作响, 散发着历史的气味.

sentences.en: People who toiled in dim, dank factories were too exhausted to enjoy their family life.
sentences.cn: 在昏暗潮湿的工厂辛苦劳作的人们累得无力再去享受家庭生活。

sentences.en: Sue's cousin was plastering the ceiling in a dank basement.
sentences.cn: 苏的表弟当时正在一间潮湿的地下室抹房顶.

sentences.en: The air around him felt dank and airless.
sentences.cn: 周围的空气阴湿寒冷,也不流通.

sentences.en: The air was so dank that the smoke hung heavily.
sentences.cn: 空气十分潮湿,所以烟气沉重地悬浮着.

sentences.en: The pitch darkness and the dank mist made him feel more lost.
sentences.cn: 夜还很黑,空中有些湿冷的雾气,心中更觉得渺茫.

sentences.en: The prison was cold and dank.
We which le dank you to owe kind invitation tonight.
sentences.cn: 咱们全都感谢你今晚好意的邀请.

trans.tran_cn: 阴湿的，阴冷的，潮呼呼，冒出
